# WARNING | PUMAS | The aerosols require higher scattering requirements, of NMAX:1 and LMAX:80, for the selected aerosols having a max g of 0.91.
# WARNING | PUMAS | Maximum number of [lines x layers] reached for CH4 - HIT[6]. Reduce number of layers or spectral range for the line-by-line calculation.
